name: World Minigolf
description:
Why?

Our submission for the 2019 Mix and Game Jam! Theme: Dimension Change

World Minigolf takes traditional mini golf and wraps it around a sphere!

Controls:

  • Camera control: WASD / arrow keys
  • Hit golf ball: space bar / left mouse click
  • Pause menu: escape

Credits:

  • Gameplay, Shaders: Dexter André Osiander
  • 3D: Bjørnar Børsheim
  • Textures / UI: Ingvild Grotløkken
  • Audio: Niklas Gløsen
